name: Out of time (itch) (gluftur)
description:
When a science experiment goes wrong, the space time continuum is thrown into chaos.  A 3D adventure game.

W,A,S,D - Move
SPACE - Jump
E - Interact

Post Jam Windows Version: 
https://gluftur.itch.io/out-of-control-post-jam-windows-version
The same game but potentially runs a lot smoother. But to be fair, it is uploaded post jam.
